explanation: [0-0] A boy and a woman are sitting in a tractor, which is on the land, with gray smoke coming out of the black chimney. The boy is wearing a yellow hat and an orange top; the woman is wearing a red hat and a yellow top. The background is a farm and a blue sky with white clouds. There is a train on their left side.
[0-3] The tractor drives to the right, they laugh happily, the woman moves her hands back and forth, the tractor continues to drive, passing a windmill.
[0-3] The tractor drives to the right, they laugh happily, the woman moves her hands back and forth, the tractor continues to drive, passing a windmill.
[0-3] The tractor drives to the right, they laugh happily, the woman moves her hands back and forth, the tractor continues to drive, passing a windmill.
[3-5] Then, the tractor stops abruptly as the rear wheel passes over a rock, with white gas under the tire. The boy and the woman both lean out of the window to check.
[3-5] Then, the tractor stops abruptly as the rear wheel passes over a rock, with white gas under the tire. The boy and the woman both lean out of the window to check.

[5-14] Subsequently, both the boy and the woman get off the tractor to check the tire. The woman holds her head in her hands, pouts, and looks ahead. The boy rests his chin on his left hand, suddenly thinks of something and raises his right index finger. Then the boy takes an air pump and inflates the tire.

[5-14] Subsequently, both the boy and the woman get off the tractor to check the tire. The woman holds her head in her hands, pouts, and looks ahead. The boy rests his chin on his left hand, suddenly thinks of something and raises his right index finger. Then the boy takes an air pump and inflates the tire.

[5-14] Subsequently, both the boy and the woman get off the tractor to check the tire. The woman holds her head in her hands, pouts, and looks ahead. The boy rests his chin on his left hand, suddenly thinks of something and raises his right index finger. Then the boy takes an air pump and inflates the tire.

[14-23] Immediately, the upper part of the tire leaks, and white smoke comes out. The woman points to the hole in the tire, turns around, spreads her hands, and looks ahead helplessly. The boy suddenly realizes, raises his right index finger, then takes out a red fork from the left side, and puts the red fork into the leaking place. The woman watches in surprise as the boy repairs the hole in the tire. The woman and the boy raise their thumbs up towards the front. After that, the boy jumps happily, the woman smiles and claps her hands towards the front.
